AI Academy is the flagship AI for business educational experience. Led by our AI Academy faculty, the curriculum is designed to help business leaders gain the knowledge to prioritize the AI investments that can drive growth.  

AI news is moving fast. Keep your business ahead with updates about AI advancements, strategies and expert perspectives. → https://ibm.biz/BdmUyr
title: AI Academy 2024Trailer

description:
Learn more about artificial intelligence → https://ibm.biz/BdmN4j

In Episode 8 of Mixture of Experts, host Tim Hwang is joined by Kush Varshney, Kate Soule, and Maya Murad. First, the experts react to NVIDIA’s Nemotron-4 340B model launch and the future of LLM training. Next, new developments in enterprise agents create a great discussion around the reality of AI agents. Finally, will Safe SuperIntelligence Inc. become a major player in the AI space?

Intro - 0:00
Nemotron-4 340B - 1:57
AI Agents - 11:51
28:12 - Super Safe Intelligence


The opinions expressed in this podcast are solely those of the participants and do not necessarily reflect the views of IBM or any other organization or entity.

(AI) AI news moves fast. Sign up for a monthly newsletter for AI updates from IBM. → https://ibm.biz/BdmN4Z
title: NVIDIA’s Nemotron-4 340B models, Safe Superintelligence Inc. and AI agents
